title: Inline Code Execution Not Allowed in URLs
message: Inline code execution syntax (`{language} ...) cannot be used inside image or link destinations.

notes.message: This opening backtick begins an invalid code execution attempt.
notes.label: backtick-start

hints: Could you instead write an entire image or link as the code result?

cases.name: image-simple
cases.description: Image with inline code execution in URL

cases.name: link-simple
cases.description: Link with inline code execution in URL

cases.name: image-mixed
cases.description: Image with text before inline code

cases.name: link-mixed
cases.description: Link with text before inline code
